title: Electrochemically modulated separation of olefin–paraffin gas mixtures in membrane electrode assemblies
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3YA00508A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Toshihiro Akashige, Adlai B. Katzenberg, Daniel M. Frey, Debdyuti Mukherjee, César A. Urbina Blanco, Brian Chen, Yoshiyuki Okamoto, Miguel A. Modestino
Electrochemical flow cell demonstrates near-100% chemisorbing selectivity in separating propylene–propane gas mixtures, paving the way towards a sustainable olefin purifying process.
